title: Capacitor - dielectric to get 16 uJ at 1 point 6 V

content.question: An air-gap parallel plate capacitor has a capacitance of <math alttext="2.0 microfarads" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>μF</mi></math>. If a dielectric material is used to fill the gap between the capacitor plates, what dielectric constant would result in <math alttext="16 microjoules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>16</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>μJ</mi></math> of energy being stored in the capacitor when the potential difference across the plates is <math alttext="1.6 volts" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.6</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></math> ?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
